title: Virtual Network Control System Optimization: Simulation-Based Advanced Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of power system control, basic MATLAB/Simulink operation skills, and understanding of deep learning concepts
context.additional_context: Performing team-based collaborative projects in a BYOD environment, solving simulation tasks reflecting uncertainties in real industrial settings

learning_goals: A simulation is conducted to improve the stability of a virtual network system by 20% or more using a TD3-based adaptive control algorithm.
A report is written comparing the disturbance suppression performance of a DRL model against conventional VSG control methods under nonlinear environments.
A modular multilevel converter (MMC) control system is designed using the DRL Toolbox in MATLAB/Simulink.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
